attributes.review: this app has been by FAR the worst app I've ever installed it took literally 2 days to install on my phone. The home screen was orange when it did finally install with a red stripe and it kept giving me relentless ads. It also spammed my email and my phone with notifications!

attributes.review: This app does not work it makes my entire phone glitch out the it turns off. It plays loud music when I open the app and it wouldn’t turn off. The app also slows down my phone and makes it to where I can’t open my other apps

attributes.review: I was excited to finally get updates on what was happening but the app keeps crashing. The text messages that I get sent don’t make sense and the screen glitches all the time. If he really cared about us then he would fix it😡

attributes.review: i was so excited to download the app and support the big orange cheeto!🧡 It took 4 days to fully download😿and when it downloaded, it kept glitching and it eventually made my phone crash so bad! the app also attracted so many bugs to crawl onto my phone when they saw the app. DONT GET THIS APP
